member.name: T:Discord.Commands.AliasAttribute
member.summary: Provides aliases for a command.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.AliasAttribute.Aliases
member.summary: The aliases which have been defined for the command.

member.name: M:Discord.Commands.AliasAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a new with the given aliases.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.PreconditionAttribute.Group
member.summary: Specify a group that this precondition belongs to. Preconditions of the same group require only one of the preconditions to pass in order to be successful (A || B). Specifying = or not at all will require *all* preconditions to pass, just like normal (A && B).

member.name: T:Discord.Commands.RequireBotPermissionAttribute
member.summary: This attribute requires that the bot has a specified permission in the channel a command is invoked in.

member.name: M:Discord.Commands.RequireBotPermissionAttribute.#ctor(Discord.GuildPermission)
member.summary: Require that the bot account has a specified GuildPermission
member.remarks: This precondition will always fail if the command is being invoked in a private channel.
member.param: The GuildPermission that the bot must have. Multiple permissions can be specified by ORing the permissions together.

member.name: M:Discord.Commands.RequireBotPermissionAttribute.#ctor(Discord.ChannelPermission)
member.summary: Require that the bot account has a specified ChannelPermission.
member.param: The ChannelPermission that the bot must have. Multiple permissions can be specified by ORing the permissions together.

member.name: T:Discord.Commands.RequireContextAttribute
member.summary: Require that the command be invoked in a specified context.

member.name: M:Discord.Commands.RequireContextAttribute.#ctor(Discord.Commands.ContextType)
member.summary: Require that the command be invoked in a specified context.
member.param: The type of context the command can be invoked in. Multiple contexts can be specified by ORing the contexts together.

member.name: T:Discord.Commands.RequireNsfwAttribute
member.summary: Require that the command is invoked in a channel marked NSFW

member.name: T:Discord.Commands.RequireOwnerAttribute
member.summary: Require that the command is invoked by the owner of the bot.
member.remarks: This precondition will only work if the bot is a bot account.

member.name: T:Discord.Commands.RequireUserPermissionAttribute
member.summary: This attribute requires that the user invoking the command has a specified permission.

member.name: M:Discord.Commands.RequireUserPermissionAttribute.#ctor(Discord.GuildPermission)
member.summary: Require that the user invoking the command has a specified GuildPermission
member.remarks: This precondition will always fail if the command is being invoked in a private channel.
member.param: The GuildPermission that the user must have. Multiple permissions can be specified by ORing the permissions together.

member.name: M:Discord.Commands.RequireUserPermissionAttribute.#ctor(Discord.ChannelPermission)
member.summary: Require that the user invoking the command has a specified ChannelPermission.
member.param: The ChannelPermission that the user must have. Multiple permissions can be specified by ORing the permissions together.

member.name: T:Discord.Commands.PriorityAttribute
member.summary: Sets priority of commands

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.PriorityAttribute.Priority
member.summary: The priority which has been set for the command

member.name: M:Discord.Commands.PriorityAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new with the given priority.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfig.DefaultRunMode
member.summary: The default RunMode commands should have, if one is not specified on the Command attribute or builder.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfig.CaseSensitiveCommands
member.summary: Should commands be case-sensitive?

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfig.LogLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum log level severity that will be sent to the Log event.

member.name: P:Discord.Commands.CommandServiceConfig.ThrowOnError
member.summary: Gets or sets whether RunMode.Sync commands should push exceptions up to the caller.
